triples.name: Logistic regression
triples.relevance: Used as one of the seven ML algorithms for predicting diabetes with good performance.

triples.name: Support vector machine
triples.relevance: Used as one of the seven ML algorithms for predicting diabetes with good performance.

triples.name: Neural network
triples.relevance: A NN model with two hidden layers was built and tested, achieving 88.6% accuracy on diabetes prediction.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: Used as one of the data analysis techniques for predicting diabetes.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: The foundational concept for the algorithms and methods used in the diabetes prediction study.

triples.name: Diabetes
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a solution for early detection of diabetes using machine learning algorithms.
